short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Startpage and NewTab with wunderful wallpapers. Integrated Google Translator, Google Calendar, Notes/Todo-List, Calculator.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We enchant your Startpage and your New Tab :-)
We dont need any Permissions and its 100% Free to use

Every time you open your browser you'll be surprised with a New Wonderful Wallpaper.
Your Startpage / New Tab now also has a Search Bar together with your Bookmarks according to your wishes.
We show you the current weather in your favorite place.

That's not all !! We still conjure 4 great tools in your Browser.
Very usefull!

You can now access the Google Translator, Calculator, Google Calendar and Notepad / Todo-List directly while browsing.
In the menu you can turn off functions that you dont need.
Tell us about your ideas so that others can benefit as well :-)

FEATURES
- Every start you get surpised with a wonderful background
- Weather from your picked location - incl. next 3 days
- Search Bar from Google with lovely results :-)
- Your favorite Bookmarks always at hand
- Google Translator while browsing
- Google Calendar while browsing
- Calculator while browsing
- Notepad / Todo List while browsing
- Time and Date
- 1 Click deactivate tools you dont need
